00113 double FFNet::g(double a) {
00114   return 1 / (1 + exp(-a));
00115 }
00116

00118 //===========================================================================
00145 double FFNet::dg(double ga) {
00146   return ga * (1 - ga);
00147 }
00148

00150 //===========================================================================
00190 double FFNet::gOutput(double a) {
00191   return 1 / (1 + exp(-a));
00192 }
00193 
00194 //===========================================================================
00222 double FFNet::dgOutput(double ga) {
00223   return ga * (1 - ga);
00224 }

00226 //===========================================================================
00252 void FFNet::initWeights(long seed, double l, double h ) {
00253   Rng::seed(seed);
00254   for(unsigned i = inputDimension; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00255     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) 
00256       if(connection(i, j)) weight(i, j) = Rng::uni(l, h); 
00257     if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) weight(i, bias) = Rng::uni(l, h);
00258   }
00259   writeParameters();
00260 }

00288 void FFNet::initWeights(double l, double h) {

00290     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) 
00291       if(connection(i, j)) weight(i, j) = Rng::uni(l, h); 
00292     if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) weight(i, bias) = Rng::uni(l, h);
00293   }

00297 //===========================================================================
00323 inline
00324 void FFNet::model(const Array<double> &input, Array<double> &output) {
00325   readParameters();
00326   if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00327     activate(input);
00328     for(unsigned i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++)
00329       output(c) = z[i];
00330   } else {
00331     for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); pattern++) {
00332       activate(input[pattern]);
00333       for(unsigned i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++)
00334         output(pattern, c) = z[i];
00335     }
00336   }
00337 }

00339 //===========================================================================
00366 inline
00367 void FFNet::backprop() {
00368   unsigned i, j;  // denote neurons
00369   unsigned c;     // denotes output
00370   unsigned pos;   // the actual position in the Array dmdw
00371   double sum;
00372 
00373   // 1. the 'local gradient' deltas for each
00374   //    output are calculated
00375   
00376   // output neurons
00377   for(j = firstOutputNeuron; j < numberOfNeurons; j++)
00378     for(c = 0; c < outputDimension; c++)
00379       if(c + firstOutputNeuron == j)  d(c, j) = dgOutput(z[j]);
00380       else d(c, j) = 0;
00381   
00382   // hidden units
00383   for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00384     for(c = 0; c < outputDimension; c++) {
00385       sum = 0;
00386       for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00387         if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * d(c, i);
00388       }
00389       d(c, j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00390     }
00391   }
00392   
00393   // 2. the gradient for each output is calculated from
00394   //    delta
00395   pos = 0;
00396   for(i = inputDimension; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00397     for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00398       if(connection(i, j)) {
00399         for(c = 0; c < outputDimension; c++) { 
00400           dmdw(c, pos) += d(c, i) * z[j];
00401         }
00402         pos++;
00403       }
00404     }
00405     if(connection(i, bias)) {
00406       for(c = 0; c < outputDimension; c++) { // bias 
00407         dmdw(c, pos) += d(c, i);
00408       }
00409       pos++;
00410     }
00411   }
00412 }

00414 //===========================================================================
00439 void FFNet::dmodel(const Array<double> &input, Array<double> &output) {
00440   unsigned i;  // denotes neurons
00441   unsigned c;  // denotes output
00442 
00443   dmdw =0.;
00444 
00445 #ifdef BASE_DMODEL_ON_DF
00446   Array<double> coeffs;
00447   coeffs.resize(outputDimension, false);
00448   Array<double> gradbuf;
00449   gradbuf.resize(w.nelem(), false);
00450 #endif
00451 
00452   readParameters();
00453 
00454   if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00455     // calculate output
00456     activate(input);
00457     for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++)
00458       output(c) = z[i];
00459 #ifdef BASE_DMODEL_ON_DF
00460     for(i = 0 ; i < outputDimension; i++) {
00461       coeffs = 0.; coeffs(i) = 1.;
00462       gradbuf = 0.;
00463       df(coeffs, gradbuf);
00464       dmdw[i] -= gradbuf;
00465     }
00466 #else
00467     // backpropagation step
00468     backprop();
00469 #endif
00470   } else {
00471     for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); pattern++) {
00472       activate(input[pattern]);
00473       for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++)
00474         output(pattern, c) = z[i];
00475 #ifdef BASE_DMODEL_ON_DF
00476       for(i = 0 ; i < outputDimension; i++) {
00477         coeffs = 0.; coeffs(i) = 1.;
00478         gradbuf = 0.;
00479         df(coeffs, gradbuf);
00480         dmdw[i] -= gradbuf;
00481       }
00482 #else
00483       backprop();
00484 #endif
00485     }
00486   }
00487 };
00488 
00489 inline void FFNet::df(const Array<double> &coeffs, Array<double> &dfdw) {
00490   unsigned i, j;  // denote neurons
00491   unsigned c;     // denotes output
00492   unsigned pos;   // the actual position in the Array dedw
00493   double sum;
00494 
00495   for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++) {
00496     delta(i) =  coeffs(c) * dgOutput(z[i]);
00497   }
00498   
00499   // hidden units
00500   for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00501     sum = 0;
00502     for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00503       if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * delta(i);
00504     }
00505     delta(j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00506   }
00507   
00508   // calculate error gradient
00509   pos = 0;
00510   for(i = inputDimension; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00511     for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00512       if(connection(i, j)) {
00513         dfdw(pos) -= delta(i) * z[j];
00514         pos++;
00515       }
00516     }
00517     if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00518       dfdw(pos) -= delta(i); 
00519       pos++;
00520     }
00521   }
00522 };

00524 //===========================================================================
00552 inline 
00553 void FFNet::dmodel  (const Array<double> &input) {
00554   readParameters();
00555 
00556   if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00557     activate(input);
00558     // backpropagation step
00559     backprop();
00560   } else {
00561     cerr << "the derivative of the model with respect to more" 
00562          << " than one input is not defined" << endl;
00563     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00564   }
00565 };

00568 //===========================================================================
00592 void FFNet::resize() {
00593   numberOfNeurons   = connectionMatrix.dim(0);
00594   bias              = numberOfNeurons;
00595   firstOutputNeuron = numberOfNeurons - outputDimension;
00596 
00597   unsigned numberOfWeights = 0; //numberOfNeurons - inputDimension;
00598   for(unsigned i = 0; i < connectionMatrix.dim(0); i++) {
00599     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) 
00600       if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) numberOfWeights++;
00601     if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) numberOfWeights++;
00602   }
00603 
00604   w.resize (numberOfWeights);
00605   d.resize (outputDimension, numberOfNeurons);
00606   dmdw.resize(outputDimension, numberOfWeights);
00607   dedw.resize(numberOfWeights);
00608   delta.resize(numberOfNeurons, false);
00609 
00610   if (z) delete [] z;
00611   if (numberOfNeurons) z = new double[numberOfNeurons];
00612   else z = NULL;
00613 }

00640 FFNet::FFNet(const unsigned in, const unsigned out) {
00641   inputDimension   = in;
00642   outputDimension  = out;
00643 
00644   numberOfNeurons   = 0;
00645   bias              = 0;
00646   firstOutputNeuron = 0;
00647 
00648   z = NULL;
00649 }

00652 //===========================================================================
00681 FFNet::FFNet(const unsigned in, unsigned out, 
00682              const Array<int>& cmat) {
00683   if(cmat.ndim()!=2) {
00684     cerr << "connection matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00685     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00686   }
00687   if(cmat.dim(0) != (cmat.dim(1) - 1)) {
00688     cerr << "connection matrix has to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00689     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00690   }
00691 
00692   inputDimension   = in;
00693   outputDimension  = out;
00694   connectionMatrix = cmat;
00695 
00696   weightMatrix.resize(connectionMatrix); 
00697   weightMatrix     = 0;
00698 
00699   z = NULL;
00700 
00701   resize();
00702   writeParameters();
00703 }

00706 //===========================================================================
00734 FFNet::FFNet(const unsigned in, unsigned out, 
00735              const Array<int>& cmat, const Array<double>& wmat) {
00736   if(cmat.ndim()!=2) {
00737     cerr << "connection matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00738     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00739   }
00740   if(cmat.dim(0) != (cmat.dim(1) - 1)) {
00741     cerr << "connection matrix has to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00742     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00743   }
00744   if(wmat.ndim()!=2) {
00745     cerr << "weight matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00746     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00747   }
00748   if(wmat.dim(0) != (wmat.dim(1) - 1)) {
00749     cerr << "weight matrix has to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00750     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00751   }
00752 
00753   inputDimension   = in;
00754   outputDimension  = out;
00755   connectionMatrix = cmat;
00756   weightMatrix     = wmat; 
00757 
00758   z = NULL;
00759   resize();
00760   writeParameters();
00761 }

00816 FFNet::FFNet(const string &filename) {
00817   ifstream input(filename.c_str());
00818   if(!input) {
00819     cerr << "cannot open net file " << filename << endl;
00820     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00821   }
00822   z = NULL;
00823   input >> *this;
00824   input.close();
00825 }

00828 //===========================================================================
00855 void FFNet::setStructure(const Array<int>& cmat, const Array<double>& wmat) {
00856   if((cmat.ndim()!=2) || 
00857      (wmat.ndim()!=2)) {
00858     cerr << "connection or weight matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00859     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00860   }
00861 
00862   if((cmat.dim(0) != (cmat.dim(1) - 1)) || 
00863      (cmat.dim(0) != wmat.dim(0)) ||
00864      (cmat.dim(1) != wmat.dim(1))) {
00865     cerr << "connection and weight matrices have to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00866     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00867   }
00868 
00869   connectionMatrix = cmat;
00870   weightMatrix     = wmat;
00871 
00872   resize();
00873   writeParameters();
00874 }

00876 //===========================================================================
00901 void FFNet::setStructure(const Array<int>& cmat) {
00902   if(cmat.ndim()!=2) {
00903     cerr << "connection matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00904     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00905   }
00906   if(cmat.dim(0) != (cmat.dim(1) - 1)) {
00907     cerr << "connection matrix has to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00908     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00909   }
00910 
00911   connectionMatrix = cmat;
00912   weightMatrix.resize(cmat.dim(0), cmat.dim(1), false);
00913 
00914   resize();
00915   w = 0;
00916 
00917   writeParameters();
00918 }

00921 //===========================================================================
00955 void FFNet::setStructure(const Array<double>& wmat, bool preserve) {
00956   if(wmat.ndim()!=2) {
00957     cerr << "weight matrix has not dimension two" << endl;
00958     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00959   }
00960   if(wmat.dim(0) != (wmat.dim(1) - 1)) {
00961     cerr << "weight matrix has to be (N + 1) x N" << endl;
00962     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00963   }
00964 
00965   weightMatrix = wmat;
00966   connectionMatrix.resize(wmat.dim(0), wmat.dim(1), false);
00967 
00968   numberOfNeurons   = connectionMatrix.dim(0);
00969   bias              = numberOfNeurons;
00970   firstOutputNeuron = numberOfNeurons - outputDimension;
00971 
00972   unsigned numberOfWeights = 0;
00973   for(unsigned i = 0; i < connectionMatrix.dim(0); i++) {
00974     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00975       if(preserve) {
00976         if(weightMatrix(i, j)  != 0.) {
00977           if(connectionMatrix(i, j) == 0) {
00978             cerr << "weight specified for non-existing connection" << endl;
00979             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00980           }
00981           numberOfWeights++;
00982         } else if(connectionMatrix(i, j) != 0) numberOfWeights++;
00983         if(weightMatrix(i, bias)  != 0.) {
00984           if(connectionMatrix(i, bias) == 0) {
00985             cerr << "weight specified for non-existing bias" << endl;
00986             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00987           }
00988           numberOfWeights++;
00989         } else if(connectionMatrix(i, bias) != 0) numberOfWeights++;
00990       } else {
00991         if(weightMatrix(i, j)  != 0.) {
00992           connectionMatrix(i, j) = 1;
00993           numberOfWeights++;
00994         } else {
00995           connectionMatrix(i, j) = 0;     
00996         }
00997         if(weightMatrix(i, bias)  != 0.) {
00998           connectionMatrix(i, bias) = 1;
00999           numberOfWeights++;
01000         } else {
01001           connectionMatrix(i, bias) = 0;          
01002         }
01003       }
01004     }
01005   }
01006   
01007   resize ();
01008   writeParameters();
01009 }

01011 //===========================================================================
01038 void FFNet::writeParameters() {
01039   for(unsigned k = 0, i = 0; i < connectionMatrix.dim(0); i++) {
01040     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) {
01041       if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) {
01042         w(k) = weight(i, j);
01043         k++;
01044       }
01045     }
01046     if(i >= inputDimension) {
01047       if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) {
01048         w(k) = weight(i, bias);
01049         k++;
01050       }
01051     }
01052   }
01053 }  
01054 
01055 //===========================================================================
01081 void FFNet::readParameters() {
01082   for(unsigned k = 0, i = 0; i < connectionMatrix.dim(0); i++) {
01083     for(unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) {
01084       if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) {
01085         weight(i, j) = w(k);
01086         k++;
01087       }
01088     }
01089     if(i >= inputDimension) {
01090       if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) {
01091         weight(i, bias) = w(k);
01092         k++;
01093       }
01094     }
01095   }
01096 }

01140 const Array< int > &FFNet::getConnections() {

01168 ostream& operator<< (ostream& os, FFNet &net)
01169 {
01170   os << net.inputDimension << " " << net.outputDimension << "\n";
01171   writeArray(net.connectionMatrix, os,"","\n",' ');
01172   writeArray(net.weightMatrix, os,"","\n",' ');
01173   return os;
01174 }

01177 //===========================================================================
01204 istream& operator>> (istream& is, FFNet &net)
01205 {
01206   unsigned i, j, n, pos;
01207   double v, dn;
01208   vector<double> l;
01209 
01210   is >> net.inputDimension;
01211   is >> net.outputDimension;
01212 
01213   is >> v;
01214   while(is) {
01215     l.push_back(v);
01216     is >> v;
01217   }
01218 
01219   if(!l.size()) {
01220     cerr << "no matrices given in net file";
01221     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01222   }
01223 
01224   dn = (sqrt(1. + l.size() * 2.) - 1.) / 2.;
01225   n = unsigned(dn);
01226   if(double(n) == dn) { // new style with bias
01227     net.connectionMatrix.resize(n, n + 1);
01228     net.weightMatrix.resize(n, n + 1);
01229 
01230     pos = 0;
01231     for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01232       for(j = 0; j < n + 1; j++) {
01233         net.connectionMatrix(i, j) = unsigned(l[pos]);
01234         pos++;
01235       }
01236     }
01237 
01238     for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01239       for(j = 0; j < n + 1; j++) {
01240         net.weightMatrix(i, j) = l[pos];
01241         pos++;
01242       }
01243     }
01244   } else { // old style without bias
01245     dn = (sqrt(1. + l.size() * 8.) - 1.) / 4.;
01246     n =  unsigned(dn);
01247     if(double(n) == dn) {
01248       net.connectionMatrix.resize(n, n + 1);
01249       net.weightMatrix.resize(n, n + 1);
01250 
01251       pos = 0;
01252       for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01253         for(j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01254           net.connectionMatrix(i, j) = unsigned(l[pos]);
01255           pos++;
01256         }
01257         // handle bias
01258         if(i >= net.inputDimension) net.connectionMatrix(i, n) = 1; 
01259         else net.connectionMatrix(i, n) = 0;
01260       }
01261       for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01262         for(j = 0; j < n + 1; j++) {
01263           net.weightMatrix(i, j) = l[pos];
01264           pos++;
01265         }
01266       }
01267     } else { // no style
01268       cerr << "cannot parse network configuration file" << endl;
01269       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01270     }
01271   }
01272 
01273   net.resize();
01274   net.writeParameters();
01275 
01276   return is;
01277 }
